project.name: Landing Page Template System
project.description: A production-ready landing page template system that gives marketers full visual control over design and content

goal: Drive qualified demo/sign-up form submissions via a template that non-technical marketers can fully customize—including copy, images, colors, and behaviors—without developer intervention.
value_proposition: A production-ready landing page template system that gives marketers full visual control over design and content, enabling rapid, safe customization and deployment without code.

personas.name: Maya
personas.summary: Marketing Manager launching campaigns independently. Needs intuitive visual controls, real-time previews, and scheduled publishing without developer help.

personas.name: Alex
personas.summary: Freelance Developer building for self-managing clients. Requires clear CMS schema, secure theme overrides, and clean integration hooks.

personas.name: Taylor
personas.summary: Content Editor responsible for updates and localization. Requires WYSIWYG editing, media replacement, approval workflows, and translation tools.
